title: Liverpool explosion: Police declare car blast terrorist incident, arrest four
content:
1. Liverpool explosion: Police declare car blast terrorist incident, arrest four  NPR
  2. Explosion outside Liverpool hospital was a terrorist incident, UK police say  Fox News
  3. Hero taxi driver locks terror suspect in car before blast outside Liverpool hospital  New York Post
  4. UK counter-terrorism police arrest three after Liverpool car blast  Reuters
  5. Liverpool Women's Hospital explosion: Terror threat level raised to 'severe'  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
